response.raw_message_text:
```json
{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("age", "medium", "The person is a young adult."),
    ("race", "low", "He identifies himself as White."),
    ("height", "high", "He has a height of 5 feet 7 inches."),
    ("weight", "low", "He weighs 140 lbs. and has never been married."),
    ("job history", "medium", "He has held one job during the year."),
    ("education level", "low", "He has a high school diploma."),
    ("college enrollment", "high", "He is enrolled in a 4-year college."),
    ("living situation", "low", "He lives alone and considers living with his biological parents in an urban area."),
    ("drug use history", "medium", "He has used drugs in the past four years (marijuana and cocaine) and has not felt depressed over the past month."),
    ("family background", "high", "His father lived with both of his biological parents in a household of size 4, in an urban area.")
  ],
  "prediction": "YES",
  "confidence": 95
}
```

prompt.system:
You are a highly experienced criminal justice risk assessment expert
employing advanced statistical and judicial knowledge.
prompt.user:
You are a criminal risk assessment expert. Step back, take a deep breath and carefully think step by step to assign a relative weight [low, medium, high] to each risk factor before using them to collectively predict 3-year rearrest recidivism:
The person is a 21-year-old male who identifies himself as White. He has been arrested 2 times but has not been convicted. He is 5 feet 7 inches and weighs 140 lbs. He has never been married and is currently living alone. He has a high school diploma and is enrolled in a 4-year college. He has held 1 job during the year. He has used drugs in the past four years (marijuana and cocaine) and has not felt depressed over the past month. At a young age, he lived with both of his biological parents in a household of size 4, in an urban area. He considers that God has nothing to do with what happens to him personally.

After your analysis, you must respond ONLY with a JSON object in exactly this format, with no additional text:

{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("factor1", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ("factor2", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ...
  ],
  "prediction": "YES" or "NO",
  "confidence": number between 0 and 100
}
